!Tablet of Vision: The Tablet of Vision begins to be wrapped up in brightness. Thunderous chanting clogs your mind and yet gives you understand of something.... something that cannot be understood! You hear a familiar woman's voice whispering again. The location of the next Stone of Commune is gradually becoming clear...The Shrine in Goddard Castle Town...There is Grand Magister Fairen...%% Grand Magister Fairen has the Stone of Commune! The vision disappears slowly, and there is the Tablet of Vision, no longer emitting light.
